text: The Madison International Speedway (MIS) is a half-mile oval racetrack in the Town of Rutland near Oregon, Wisconsin, United States. The track is known as "The Track of Champions" and "Wisconsin's Fastest Half Mile." The weekly program at the track runs on Friday nights under NASCAR Advance Auto Parts Weekly Series sanction.Track history. Madison International Speedway. ==References== Category:Auto racing
title: Madison International Speedway
